help: Hi I'm Orby! Here are the things I help you with.
**-orb top** - Show the top orb hoarders.
msg.notAllowedInDm: This command doesn't work in direct messages. Try again in a server channel.
msg.invalidOrbCount: Please provide a valid orb count.
msg.cantUpdateOwnerNickname: The owners nickname cannot be updated.
msg.noPermissionChangeNickname: I don't have permission to change your nickname!
